content: this delicate bookmark is a wonderful gift for the book lover in your life bookmark measures 7½ 19 cm excluding ribbon **materials needed** * aunt lydia s® metallic crochet thread size 10 1 ball 226 natural/gold * susan bates® steelite® crochet hook 1 75mm us 4 * 1/4 5 cm wide ribbon measuring 10 25 5 cm long * liquid starch optional
